title: Ep. 99 - New Heartland Studio Debut
description: If you don't watch Heartland Radio 2.0 on YouTube, you might want to at least give this episode a peek because the boys are in a new studio with a brand new look. It's not The Pat McAfee Studio but it is the new Heartland Radio studio and we dig it. Today the boys talked about their favorite bite-size oven snacks, their favorite bands from high school and detail plans for the future as far as this podcast is concerned. They closed the episode with some great listener questions and Friday Bangerz. See yuz in a couple weeks!
dc:creator: The Pod
